price: Ǹjẹ́ ìbúra wà nínú ìyẹn fún onílàákàyè?
arabic: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: hal fī dhālika qasamun lidhī ḥij'rin
